org.devgateway.ocds.persistence.mongo.merge

Annotation Type Merge


  • @Retention(value=RUNTIME)
public @interface Merge
    Applied JSON merge strategy for OCDS fields. This is defined in OCDS schema as extra field Metadata, with property names: mergeStrategy and mergeOptions.

    More details on the official Python tool that performs the JSON merge

    jsonmerge

    OCDS Merging

    See Also:
    MergeStrategy

    • Required Element Summary

      Required Elements 
      Modifier and Type Required Element and Description
      MergeStrategy value
      The applied merge strategy

    • Optional Element Summary

      Optional Elements 
      Modifier and Type Optional Element and Description
      java.lang.String[] mergeOptions
      Optional merge options.

    • Element Detail

      • value

        public abstract MergeStrategy value
        The applied merge strategy
        Returns:
        See Also:
        MergeStrategy

      • mergeOptions

        public abstract java.lang.String[] mergeOptions
        Optional merge options. One example is to specify the id reference in case the selected strategy is MergeStrategy.arrayMergeById. Example: mergeOptions={"idref","id"} jsonmerge says this is the default behavior, to assume the idref is "id", so we have implement this as the default
        Returns:
        Default:
        ""
